title: Alyaksey Hawrylovich
text:
Alyaksey Viktaravich Hawrylovich (; ; born 5 January 1990) is a <a href="Belarus">Belarus</a>ian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who plays for Russian club <a href="FC%20Chayka%20Peschanokopskoye">Chayka Peschanokopskoye</a>.
Club career.
On 10 June 2021, he signed a 2-year contract with <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> club <a href="FC%20Chayka%20Peschanokopskoye">Chayka Peschanokopskoye</a>.
International career.
He played for the <a href="Belarus%20Olympic%20football%20team">Belarus Olympic football team</a> at the <a href="2012%20Summer%20Olympics">2012 Summer Olympics</a>.
Honours.
Naftan Novopolotsk
Dinamo Brest
